sources.title: The Rise of Duton Lang (1955)
sources.description: Professor Duton Lang is an obese scientist who has made many great discoveries. When he finally weights 497 pounds he develops a compound which permits him to eat as much as he wants and still lose weight. He gets down to 150 pounds in weight but is still the same body-size as when he weighed nearly 500 pounds. Eventually, he becomes a minus-weight and floats off into outer space. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-rise-of-duton-lang-1955/

metadata.Plot: Professor Duton Lang is an obese scientist who has made many great discoveries. When he finally weights 497 pounds he develops a compound which permits him to eat as much as he wants and still lose weight. He gets down to 150 pounds in weight but is still the same body-size as when he weighed nearly 500 pounds. Eventually, he becomes a minus-weight and floats off into outer space.
metadata.Writer: Percival Wilde, Dick Shaw, Barbara Avedon
